key.name: schema-version
key.description: Version of this configuration schema. Set on first start.

key.name: use-system-defaults
key.description: If true, get configuration from system defaults first. This flag will be reset on first start.

key.name: layout
key.description: Name of the file or basename of the current layout.

key.name: theme
key.description: Name of the file or basename of the current theme.

key.name: system-theme-tracking-enabled
key.summary: Track changes of the current GTK-theme.
key.description: Switch onboard themes of matching basenames in sync with the current GTK-theme.

key.name: system-theme-associations
key.description: List of encountered system themes (GTK-themes) and the Onboard themes they are linked to.

key.name: show-status-icon
key.summary: Show status icon instead of the classic minimize.
key.description: Display an icon in the notification area to hide and show onboard.

key.name: status-icon-provider
key.description: Choose between status icon implementations. AppIndicator shows Onboard on middle-click activation, GtkStatusIcon on left-click. If unavailable, 'AppIndicator' falls back to GtkStatusIcon.

key.name: start-minimized
key.summary: Start onboard with a minimized window.
key.description: Do not display the onboard window on start; start onboard minimized.

key.name: xembed-onboard
key.summary: Show onboard when unlocking the screen.
key.description: Make onboard appear in conjunction to the dialog to unlock the screen.

key.name: show-tooltips
key.description: Show tooltips for certain buttons of the keyboard.

key.name: snippets
key.summary: Label and text for the snippet keys
key.description: Define labels and text lines for the snippet keys in the format index:label:text Allowed escape sequences are "\n" for newline, "\:" for a colon and "\\" for a backslash.

key.name: key-label-font
key.description: Default font of key labels. Applies to all themes which don't specify their font.'

key.name: key-label-overrides
key.description: Optional key labels and and size groups that override the layouts labels. Merged with current themes key_label_overrides. Format: ["key_id:label:group",...]. Colons and backslashes have to be escaped as "\:" and "\\".

key.name: current-settings-page
key.description: Current tab page of onboard-settings.

key.name: enabled
key.description: Auto-show Onboard for editable widgets. Requires gnome-accessibility (at-spi2).

key.name: widget-clearance
key.description: Border to leave unoccluded around a focused text widget (left, top, right, bottom).

key.name: show-click-buttons
key.description: Show mouse click buttons.

key.name: sticky-key-release-delay
key.description: Time of inactivity in seconds until latched and locked modifiers and layer keys are released automatically. This applies no matter if the keyboard is hidden or visible, but when hidden, "sticky-key-release-on-hide-delay" may release the keys earlier. Leave at 0.0 to not automatically release them.

key.name: sticky-key-release-on-hide-delay
key.summary: Auto-release sticky keys after hiding the keyboard
key.description: Time after hiding the keyboard in seconds until latched and locked modifiers and layer keys are released automatically. Leave at 0.0 to not automatically release them.

key.name: sticky-key-behavior
key.description: Controls the behavior of sticky keys, e.g. modifier and layer keys. Groups of keys or single keys may be assigned individual behaviors. Valid groups are 'all', 'modifiers' and 'layers'. Individual keys may be specified by their ids defined in the .layout files. Valid behaviors are: 'cycle' (default), 'dblclick', 'latch', and 'lock'.

key.name: default-key-action
key.description: The key action determines when key strokes are generated. single-stroke: generate key-press on button down, key-release on button-up. If the system is configured to do so, holding the button down long enough initiates key repeats. delayed-stroke: generate key-press and key-release on button-release, there is no support for key-repeat, but holding the button down long enough generates a long press.

key.name: key-synth
key.description: The key-stroke generator to use.

key.name: long-press-delay
key.description: Time pressing a key down until a long-press is detected.

key.name: touch-input
key.description: Listen to touch events and if enabled, allow pressing multiple keys simultaneously. Requires restart of Onboard.

key.name: input-event-source
key.description: Receive pointing device events from either GTK (safe) or XInput (experimental, but recommended if it works). XInput gets around many pointer grabs, i.e. allows to freely enter text into text entries with pop-up windows, for example the firefox URL-bar.

key.name: touch-feedback-enabled
key.description: Show extra labels above currently pressed keys.

key.name: touch-feedback-size
key.description: Size of the touch-feedback popup in pixels. 0 to let Onboard guess it based on physical monitor size.

key.name: audio-feedback-enabled
key.description: Play a sound when a key is pressed.

key.name: show-secondary-labels
key.description: Show additional key labels of different modifier levels.

key.name: window-state-sticky
key.description: Show keyboard and icon palette always on visible workspace.

key.name: window-decoration
key.description: Show window title bar and frame.

key.name: force-to-top
key.description: Use window type hint 'DOCK' for Onboards main window. This allows Onboard to type into Unity dash.

key.name: keep-aspect-ratio
key.description: Constrain the size of the main window to the layout's aspect ratio.

key.name: transparent-background
key.description: Makes the background of the keyboard fully transparent.

key.name: transparency
key.description: Transparency of the keyboard window.

key.name: background-transparency
key.description: Transparency of the background of the keyboard window.

key.name: enable-inactive-transparency
key.description: Change transparency on inactivity.

key.name: inactive-transparency
key.description: Transparency after leaving onboards window.

key.name: inactive-transparency-delay
key.description: Delay in seconds from leaving Onboards window until the inactive transparency takes effect.

key.name: resize-handles
key.default: "E SE S SW W NW N NE"
key.description: Active resize handles, space separated.

key.name: docking-enabled
key.description: Enable docking of the keyboard window to screen edges. 'False' to leave the keaboard floating.

key.name: docking-edge
key.description: Edge to dock the keyboard window at.

key.name: docking-shrink-workarea
key.description: When docked, shrink the avaliable space for maximized windows.

key.name: x
key.description: Horizontal position of the keyboard window.

key.name: y
key.description: Vertical position of the keyboard window.

key.name: width
key.description: Width of the keyboard window.

key.name: height
key.description: Height of the keyboard window.

key.name: dock-width
key.description: Height of the docked keyboard window.

key.name: dock-height
key.description: Height of the docked keyboard window.

key.name: dock-expand
key.description: Expand the keyboard to the edges of the workarea when docked.

key.name: x
key.description: Horizontal position of the keyboard window.

key.name: y
key.description: Vertical position of the keyboard window.

key.name: width
key.description: Width of the keyboard window.

key.name: height
key.description: Height of the keyboard window..

key.name: dock-width
key.description: Height of the docked keyboard window.

key.name: dock-height
key.description: Height of the docked keyboard window.

key.name: dock-expand
key.description: Expand the keyboard to the edges of the workarea when docked.

key.name: in-use
key.summary: Show icon palette when onboard is minimized.
key.description: Display a floating icon when onboard is minimized. By clicking on it, onboard reappears.

key.name: resize-handles
key.default: "E SE S SW W NW N NE"
key.description: Active resize handles, space separated.

key.name: x
key.summary: Horizontal position of the icon palette.
key.description: Horizontal position of the icon palette on the screen.

key.name: y
key.summary: Vertical position of the icon palette.
key.description: Vertical position of the icon palette on the screen.

key.name: width
key.description: Horizontal size in pixel of the icon palette.

key.name: height
key.description: Vertical size in pixel of the icon palette.

key.name: x
key.summary: Horizontal position of the icon palette.
key.description: Horizontal position of the icon palette on the screen.

key.name: y
key.summary: Vertical position of the icon palette.
key.description: Vertical position of the icon palette on the screen.

key.name: width
key.description: Horizontal size in pixel of the icon palette.

key.name: height
key.description: Vertical size in pixel of the icon palette.

key.name: drag-threshold
key.description: Accidental resize and move protection. Threshold is the distance in pixels the pointer has to travel before the drag begins. -1 for system drag threshold, 0 to disable and any positive integer as custom threshold.

key.name: hide-click-type-window
key.description: When Hover Click is enabled, hide the system-provided window for click type selection.

key.name: enable-click-type-window-on-exit
key.description: Always enable the system provided window for click-type selection when exiting onboard. This key is deprecated and has no effect with mousetweaks version 3.10.0 or later.

key.name: color-scheme
key.description: Name of the file with the color scheme.

key.name: background-gradient
key.description: Strength of the background gradient. Range 0-100%, with 0 for flat color.

key.name: key-style
key.description: Drawing style of the keys. Valid values are currently "flat" and "gradient".

key.name: roundrect-radius
key.description: Radius of rounded corners around the keys. Range 0-100%, with 0 for fully rectangular keys.

key.name: key-size
key.description: Size of all keys relative to the layout definition in percent .

key.name: key-stroke-width
key.description: Width of the border in percent of the style default. Minimum width in screen coordinates is 1 pixel. A value of 0 turns the line off.

key.name: key-fill-gradient
key.description: Strength of the keys' fill gradient. Range 0-100%, with 0 for flat color.

key.name: key-stroke-gradient
key.description: Strength of the keys' outline gradient. Range 0-100%, with 0 for flat color.

key.name: key-gradient-direction
key.description: Direction of simulated incoming light. 0-360 degrees, where 0 stands for light from the top.

key.name: key-label-font
key.description: Font for key labels. May include the modifiers 'bold', 'italic', 'condensed', separated by spaces.

key.name: key-label-overrides
key.description: Optional key labels and and size groups that override the layouts labels. Format: ["key_id:label:group",...]. Colons and backslashes have to be escaped as "\:" and "\\".

key.name: key-shadow-strength
key.description: Strength of the keys' shadows. Range 0-100%, 0 turns shadows off.

key.name: key-shadow-size
key.description: Size and offset of the keys' shadows. Range 0-100%.

key.name: disable-click-buttons
key.description: Disallow showing click buttons.

key.name: disable-hover-click
key.description: Disable Onboard's hover click button. Hover click can still be turned on in gnome system settings.

key.name: disable-dwell-activation
key.description: Disable dwell-activation of all dwell-enabled buttons and the icon palette. This has no affect on the system-wide available hover click functionality.

key.name: disable-preferences
key.description: Disallow opening Onboards preferences via button and status menu. Onboard-settings can still be started from the desktop shortcut and from command line.

key.name: disable-quit
key.description: Disallow quitting Onboard by pressing the quit button or choosing quit from the status menu. Onboard then only closes by sending SIGTERM, i.e. killing it.

key.name: disable-touch-handles
key.description: Never show the enlarged move/resize handles for touch and hover click users.

key.name: disable-keys
key.description: Disable the key action for the listed key combinations. Entries consist of a regex pattern to match Onboard's key ids, preceeded by optional modifiers. Available modifiers are: SHIFT, CTRL, LALT, RALT, LWIN, CAPS, NMLK Example: [["LALT", "TAB"], ["LALT", "SHIFT", "TAB"], ["CTRL", "ALT", "F[0-9]+"]]

key.name: enabled
key.description: Set Onboard to keyboard scanning mode.

key.name: mode
key.description: The scan mode determines how the scanner moves between keys.

key.name: interval
key.description: The delay before the scanner selects the next key. (in seconds)

key.name: interval-fast
key.description: The scanning interval used for forward progression in 'Overscan' mode. (in seconds)

key.name: cycles
key.description: The maximum number of keyboard cycles before the scanner stops.

key.name: backtrack
key.description: The number of keys the scanner will backtrack in 'Overscan' mode.

key.name: user-scan
key.description: The scanner should only step while the switch is held down. ('Autoscan' mode)

key.name: alternate
key.description: The scanner should swap switch actions after every key activation. ('Stepscan' mode)

key.name: device-name
key.description: The name of the input device used for scanning.

key.name: device-detach
key.description: The input device should not control the system cursor/caret.

key.name: device-key-map
key.description: Maps key values to scan actions. (Format: keyval:action)

key.name: device-button-map
key.description: Maps mouse buttons to scan actions. (Format: button:action)

key.name: feedback-flash
key.description: Keys should flash when activated.

key.name: active-language
key.description: Currently active language id for word prediction and spell checker. The format is ll[_CC] where ll is a ISO 639 two letter language code and CC a ISO 3166 country code, e.g. en_US, de_DE. Leave it empty for the system default language.

key.name: recent-languages
key.description: List of most recently used languages.

key.name: max-recent-languages
key.summary: Maximum number of recently used languages.
key.description: The maximum number of recently used languages visible in the language menu.

key.name: spell-check-backend
key.description: The spell checker backend.

key.name: auto-capitalization
key.description: Automatically capitalize words while typing.

key.name: auto-correction
key.description: Automatically correct words while typing.

key.name: enabled
key.description: Set to 'true' to enable word suggestions.

key.name: spelling-suggestions-enabled
key.description: Set to 'true' to enable spelling suggestions for mispelled words at or before the cursor.

key.name: auto-learn
key.description: Continiously improve the word prediction with typed and selected words.

key.name: pause-learning-locked
key.description: Lock the button to pause learning.

key.name: punctuation-assistance
key.description: Add and remove spaces when inserting word suggestions followed by punctuation characters.

key.name: stealth-mode
key.description: Stealth mode disables word prediction, auto learning and the typing history for secure password entry.

key.name: accent-insensitive
key.description: Enable accent insensitive word completion.

key.name: max-word-choices
key.description: The maximum number of visible predicted words.

key.name: show-context-line
key.description: Display the currently edited text line in the keyboard.

key.name: wordlist-buttons
key.summary: Buttons visible in the word suggestion bar
key.description: Key ids and order of buttons visible on the word suggestion bar.
